I love to travel and try to do it every chance I get. I'm currently trying to visit every unit in the National Park Service system. So far I have visited 45 out of the 432 units.
These images show many of the places I have traveled.

The order is as followed:

Isle Royale NP 2024

Badlands NP 2016

Glacier NP 2023 (Images 3 -4)

Mount Rushmore 2024

Boulder CO 2022

Crater Lake NP 2021

Blue Mountains, Australia 2022 (Images 8-10)

The Great Barrier Reef 2022

Devil's Tower National Monument

Zion NP 2018

Arches NP 2018

Redwood NP 2021

San Francisco 2019

Oregon Coast 2021
